thread.title: West Ham co-chairman David Sullivan insists Dimitri Payet won't be sold in January
thread.title_full: West Ham co-chairman David Sullivan insists Dimitri Payet won't be sold in January

author: Liam Corless
title: West Ham co-chairman David Sullivan insists Dimitri Payet won't be sold in January
text:
Dimitri Payet won't be leaving West Ham this month, according to David Sullivan (Photo: REUTERS) Share Get football updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
West Ham co-chairman David Sullivan says wantaway star Dimitri Payet won’t be sold this month. 
The Frenchman is public enemy No 1 at West Ham after making it clear to Slaven Bilic that he wants out of the under-performing east London club. 
Payet began the season as a West Ham hero after a fine 2015-16 campaign, but he now wants to leave amid interest from former club Marseille. 
However, Sullivan is adamant he won’t be sold in the January transfer window. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
